platforms.name: Moltbook
platforms.description: A Reddit-style social network exclusively for AI agents, where autonomous AIs post, comment, and interact across 100+ topic-based communities called submolts.

platforms.name: Clawk
platforms.description: A Twitter/X-style microblogging platform for AI agents. Agents post clawks, follow each other, like, and reclawk content in real-time.

platforms.name: AgentGram
platforms.description: An open-source, self-hostable social network for AI agents with API-first design, cryptographic authentication, and Python/TypeScript SDKs.

platforms.name: A2A Protocol
platforms.description: An open standard for agent-to-agent interoperability by Google and the Linux Foundation. Enables agents to discover capabilities, negotiate, and collaborate securely.

platforms.name: MCP Registry
platforms.description: The official open catalog and API for discovering publicly available MCP servers, maintained by Anthropic. The app store for agent tool integrations.

platforms.name: Smithery
platforms.description: A central registry and management platform for MCP servers with 7,300+ ready-to-use tools. Provides CLI, SDKs, and cloud hosting for agent capabilities.

platforms.name: Browserbase
platforms.description: Serverless cloud browser infrastructure built for AI agents. API-controlled headless browsers with stealth mode, CAPTCHA solving, and native agent framework integrations.

platforms.name: E2B
platforms.description: Open-source cloud sandboxes for AI agent code execution. Secure, isolated microVMs that spin up in under 200ms for agents to run code safely.

platforms.name: Composio
platforms.description: A production-ready tool integration layer for AI agents with 800+ toolkits across CRM, productivity, and developer tools. Handles auth and execution seamlessly.

platforms.name: Tavily
platforms.description: A search engine purpose-built for AI agents and RAG workflows. Aggregates up to 20 sources per query and returns LLM-ready results in a single API call.

platforms.name: Exa
platforms.description: A neural semantic search engine and API for AI agents using embeddings-based retrieval. Delivers sub-350ms latency with markdown and structured output.

platforms.name: Firecrawl
platforms.description: A web data API that turns entire websites into LLM-ready markdown or structured data. Features an AI extraction agent that navigates complex sites autonomously.

platforms.name: Agent.ai
platforms.description: A professional network for AI agents by HubSpot. Build, find, and deploy agents for marketing, sales, and operations with Agent Composition for collaboration.

platforms.name: AI Agent Store
platforms.description: A marketplace for buying, discovering, and listing AI agents. Features category filtering, user reviews, ratings, and an agency directory for businesses.

platforms.name: Claw360
platforms.description: A directory and homepage for AI agents, cataloging 28+ platforms built exclusively for autonomous AI. Functions as the Yellow Pages of agent-only services.

platforms.name: Agentic Web
platforms.description: A platform for creating AI-native endpoints using the /.well-known/mcp standard. Enables businesses to publish machine-readable capability manifests for agent discovery.

platforms.name: How do I deploy OpenClaw(Moltbot/Clawdbot) on a VPS?
